title: Removal of Cu2+ from AMD by goethite modified biochar combined with sodium alginate: characterization, performance and mechanisms
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00664J, Paper
Hong Yang, Ruixue Zhang, Li An, Pan Wu, Yuran Fu, Jiajun Zou, Min Yu
Efficient and environmentally friendly removal of Cu2+ from wastewater was the focus of recent research. However, the acid mine drainage (AMD) produced during the mining process, characterized by low pH...
